search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Delighted (delighted.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Delighted can be found at [https://delighted.com/pricing](https://delighted.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.
